code: import{observer}from'mobx-react';import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{Col,Container,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import{Context}from'..';import{getBrandsByUserApi}from'../httpApi/BrandApi';import{getCatalogeByUserApi}from'../httpApi/CatalogeApi';import{getAllProductsByBrendApi}from'../httpApi/ProductApi';import BrandsBar from'../modules/BrandsBar';import CatalogesBar from'../modules/CatalogesBar';import ProductList from'../modules/ProductList';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Panel=observer(function(){var _useContext=useContext(Context),user=_useContext.user,brands=_useContext.brands,cataloges=_useContext.cataloges,products=_useContext.products;useEffect(function(){getCatalogeByUserApi(user.user.id).then(function(data){cataloges.set(data);getBrandsByUserApi(user.user.id).then(function(data){brands.set(data);getAllProductsByBrendApi(user.user.id).then(function(data){products.set(data);});});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CatalogesBar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{md:9,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrandsBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductList,{})]})]})});});export default Panel;
